name: Belladonna
description: Belladonna is a mostly sativa strain that also carries good indica characteristics making for a very nice hybrid.  A faster flowering time than typical sativa strains makes Belladonna a favorite among growers.  With a fruity smell and a trippy high Paradise Seeds has bred a winner.
attributes_title: Happy, Sleepy, Giggly, Euphoric, Uplifted, Stress, Depression, Pain, Fatigue, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Headache
